items.title: Blob generator
items.description: A cool generator for SVGs in blop shape.

items.title: keen-slider
items.description: A library agnostic touch slider with native touch/swipe behavior and great performance.

items.title: Collected Notes
items.description: A note-taking app, with markdown support. It uploads the taken notes to a blog.

items.title: Sitejoy
items.description: A website that lists inspirational websites, which are also fast and responsive.

items.title: Code Notes
items.description: A Gatsby theme for publishing code-related notes to your website.

items.title: FeedFox
items.description: A modern RSS reader that allows you to play youtube videos, listen to podcasts, browser reddit, twitter and more.

items.title: Chakra UI
items.description: A modern component library for React that gives you all the building blocks you need.

items.title: Grid for layout, Flexbox for components
items.description: A good article by Ahmad Shadeed about when to use flexbox or grid.

items.title: PRSS
items.description: A static site generator for blogs, doc sites and more.

items.title: discharge
items.description: A simple, easy way to deploy static websites to Amazon S3.

items.title: Image Grid Motion
items.description: A cool demo by Codrops of a motion hover effect on a background image grid.

items.title: Artvee
items.description: A huge library of paintings, drawings and illustrations with no license restrictions.
